summary: The bill, titled the Supporting Early-childhood Educators’ Deductions Act (SEED Act), amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow early childhood educators to take the educator expense deduction. It modifies Section 62 and addresses the heading in subsection (a)(2)(D) and subsections (d)(1)(A) and (d)(1)(B). The amendments are effective for expenses incurred in taxable years beginning after December 31, 2025.
